wikipedia_page.main: Benjamin Bethel Milstein (30 September 1918 – 22 April 2013) was a British surgeon and heart surgery pioneer who was heavily involved in the development of cardiothoracic surgery and early heart transplant attempts. He was a longtime employee of Papworth Hospital, a leading British heart and lung hospital.

response: **Benjamin Milstein, British cardiothoracic surgeon and heart surgery pioneer (born 1918).
*Benjamin Milstein, 94, British surgeon and academic.Ben Milstein obituary|guardian.co.uk
